actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A bill to amend section 402 of the Regional Rail Reorganization Act of 1973 to provide for an increase of $500 million in the amounts authorized to be appropriated for rail service continuation subsidies.

summary.text: Increases to $340,000,000 for each of the two succeeding fiscal years (now $90,000,000) the amount authorized to be appropriated for rail service continuation subsidies under the Regional Reorganization Act.

titles.title: A bill to amend section 402 of the Regional Rail Reorganization Act of 1973 to provide for an increase of $500 million in the amounts authorized to be appropriated for rail service continuation subsidies.
